Flow.description: 11-03-2025 : added RedirectToRecordId 20-05-2024: changed Charge Type name to 'Consignment Note', from 'Manual Charge' in JobChargeRec. 14-05-2024 : added Preferred Time Slot. 18-03-2024: added from address to Email_Send decision email 26-02-2024: added new template names 06-12-2023: added Active - Rebate Only Screen 23-10-2023: added "May Require Schedule?" on product 28-09-2023: Holiday Check Added On Delivery Date, Collection Date -bypass Site Phone number required for person account/domestic account -Site phone number is required -Sage Payment Reference required -Sage Reference added for Domestic Customer -Domestic Customer is valid for job creation curr: change Collection Date to Preferred Delivery Date for community user. prev: change Customer Reference to Client Job Booking Reference.

formulas.description: Check if the Job Type = Wait and Load, so Collection Date = Delivery Date
formulas.name: CollectionDateFormula
templateName
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Fixed",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Fixed_Job_Template_Delivery") , IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) =="Variable",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Variable_Job_Template_Delivery")
, IF(TEXT({!ordProductObj.Pricing_method__c}) == "Rebate",
CASE({!jobType}, "Exchange", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Exchange", "Wait & Load", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Wait_Load", "X2_0_Rebate_Job_Template_Delivery")
, "No Template Found")))

What3Words
